summary: Completed e2e testing of Yandex Market Scanner 4-step wizard. All 17 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI loads correctly with proper 4-step wizard navigation. Step 1 (Credentials) properly validates OAuth token before allowing navigation.
critical_code_review_comments: Yandex Market integration uses FULL API automation (unlike Uzum which uses copy-paste approach)
OAuth token validation works correctly - Continue button disabled until credentials verified
AI card generation takes 30-60 seconds - appropriate loading states shown
All data-testid attributes present for key form elements (oauth-token-input, business-id-input, product-name-input, cost-price-input, analyze-btn, create-product-btn)
test_credentials: No real Yandex credentials needed - mock data used for testing
seed_data_creation: None - used test product: Samsung Galaxy A54 5G, cost_price: 2500000, category: electronics
context_for_next_testing_agent: Yandex Market Scanner feature fully tested. Backend endpoints: /api/yandex-market/rules (GET), /api/yandex-market/calculate-price (POST), /api/yandex-market/full-process (POST), /api/yandex-market/test-connection (POST), /api/yandex-market/create-product (POST). Frontend route: /yandex-scanner. 4-step wizard: 1) API Credentials 2) Product Info 3) Price/Cost 4) Results with Create button. AI card generation works correctly with SEO score.

features_tested.4_step_wizard_ui: PASS - API Kalitlar -> Товар -> Цена -> Yaratish steps visible and navigable
features_tested.step1_oauth_token_input: PASS - OAuth Token input field visible with data-testid
features_tested.step1_business_id_input: PASS - Business ID input field visible with data-testid
features_tested.step1_continue_disabled: PASS - Continue button disabled until credentials verified
features_tested.progress_bar: PASS - Progress bar shows correct step progression (25% per step)
features_tested.full_automation_banner: PASS - Banner explaining FULL API automation vs Uzum copy-paste visible
features_tested.api_rules_endpoint: PASS - Returns commission rates, media requirements, categories
features_tested.api_calculate_price: PASS - Returns price breakdown with commission, payout_fee, logistics, net_profit
features_tested.api_full_process: PASS - Returns AI-generated product card with SEO score, price optimization, final package
features_tested.api_test_connection: PASS - Validates OAuth token and returns business_id
features_tested.api_create_product: PASS - Attempts real API call (fails with invalid token as expected)

api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/yandex-market/rules: PASS - Returns Yandex Market rules and requirements
api_endpoints_tested.POST /api/yandex-market/calculate-price: PASS - Calculates optimal price with all fees
api_endpoints_tested.POST /api/yandex-market/full-process: PASS - Full product card generation with AI
api_endpoints_tested.POST /api/yandex-market/create-product: PASS - Real API product creation (requires valid token)
